Top concerts to check out

Louisville 7:16 a.m. EST December 3, 2014

Man playing guitar on stage(Photo: Getty Images/Comstock Images)

CONNECT 1 TWEETLINKEDINCOMMENTEMAILMORE

Keltricity, Cathy Wilde, Lorinda Jones. The Bard's Town, 1801 Bardstown Road, 7:30 p.m. Friday and Saturday. "Yule Y'All: A Celtic Yuletide Concert."Advance tickets, $12, $6 for ages 12 and younger; day of show, $15, $8 for ages 12 and younger. keltricity.com/tickets.

"Music Makes a City." Tim Faulkner Gallery, 1512 Portland Ave., 8 p.m. Saturday. With Teddy Abrams, Louisville Orchestra Director of Music. Free.

Counting Crows. Louisville Palace, 625 S. Fourth St., 7:30 p.m. Dec. 10. $29.50-$85. (800) 745-3000.

AROUND TOWN: 5 fun things this week

BARS & CLUBS: 5 spots for live music

BRING THE KIDS: Top fun things for families

ON STAGE: 5 productions now playing

And lots more concerts ...

Bluegrass

The Kevin Prater Band. Shepherdsville Music Barn, 1833 Ky. 44, 8 p.m. Friday. $12. (502) 922-0493.

Holiday

Pam Tillis & Friends: A Kentucky Christmas Dinner Show. Galt House Hotel, 140 N. Fourth St., 7 p.m. Thursday-Saturday, Monday and Tuesday. Tillis will perform some traditional Christmas songs and some of her favorites. Through Dec. 13. $77, $31 for ages 12 and younger. (502) 584-7777.

Louisville Philharmonia The Musicians' Orchestra. Beargrass Christian Church, 4100 Shelbyville Road, 7:30 p.m. Friday; 1:30 p.m. Saturday. "A Philharmonia Christmas." Free.

Keltricity, Cathy Wilde, Lorinda Jones. The Bard's Town, 1801 Bardstown Road, 7:30 p.m. Friday and Saturday. "Yule Y'All: A Celtic Yuletide Concert."Advance tickets, $12, $6 for ages 12 and younger; day of show, $15, $8 for ages 12 and younger. keltricity.com/tickets.

Voices of Kentuckiana. Clifton Center, 2117 Payne St., 7 p.m. Saturday; 4 p.m. Sunday. "Holiday Magic." $20, $15 for students and seniors. (502) 583-1013.

Louisville Chorus. St. Mary's Catholic Church, 415 E. Eighth St., New Albany, 6 p.m. Saturday. "Christmas Wonderland: Family Holiday Memories." With Holy Family Children's Choir and St. Mark's United Church of Christ Cherub and Youth Choirs. $20, $15 seniors, $5 student. (502) 968-6300.

Indiana University Southeast Orchestra, Concert Band, Concert Choir & Community Chorus. Stem Concert Hall, Ogle Cultural and Community Center, 4201 Grant Line Road, 7:30 p.m. Saturday; 3 p.m. Sunday. "Holiday Pops Spectacular." Advance tickets, $12, $10 for students; day of show, $15, $10 students. (812) 941-2525.

Thoroughbred Chorus, Forefront. Memorial Auditorium, 970 S. Fourth St., 1:30 and 7:30 p.m. Saturday. "Winter Wonderland." $18, $15 seniors, $12 students. (502) 583-7469.

Holiday Choral Festival. St. Martins of Tours Catholic Church, 639 S. Shelby St., 7 p.m. Sunday. Featuring The Louisville Chamber Choir, Voces Novae, Protus Vocal Ensemble and the Youth Performing Arts School Women's Choir. $15, $10 for Louisville Public Media members and ages 17 and younger. (877) 435-9849.

Louisville Chorus. Immaculate Conception, 502 N. Fifth St., La Grange, 4 p.m. Sunday. "Christmas at Immaculate Conception: Carols of the Nativity." With Julianna Horton, organ. $20, $15 seniors, $5 student. (502) 968-6300.

Pop/Rock

Counting Crows. Louisville Palace, 625 S. Fourth St., 7:30 p.m. Dec. 10. $29.50-$85. (800) 745-3000.

Variety

"Music Makes a City." Tim Faulkner Gallery, 1512 Portland Ave., 8 p.m. Saturday. With Teddy Abrams, Louisville Orchestra Director of Music. Free.

Locust Grove Chamber Musicians. 561 Blankenbaker Lane, 5:30 p.m. Sunday. Part of the Emilie Strong Smith Chamber Music Series. $20. (502) 897-9845.

Chamber Winds Louisville. Comstock Concert Hall, University of Louisville School of Music, First Street and Brandeis Avenue, 8 p.m. Monday. Free.

Christ Church United Methodist Church Choirs. 4614 Brownsboro Road, 7:30 p.m. Dec. 10. "Music From the Heart." Shuttle service from the Summit Office Park (Hubbards Lane and Brownsboro Road) begins at 6:30 p.m. Free.
